snippet: Mount Sinai Hospital in Manhattan has joined a number of medical centers around the country in creating a special emergency room for geriatric patients.
abstract: Mount Sinai Hospital in Manhattan joins a number of medical centers around the country in creating a special emergency room for geriatric patients; hospital officials say that people over age 65 account for 15 percent to 20 percent of emergency room visits, and that number is expected to grow as the population ages.
lead_paragraph: Mount Sinai Hospital in Manhattan has joined a number of medical centers around the country in creating a special emergency room for geriatric patients.
